subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: The 100-meter backstroke has been Aaron Peirsol’s turf since 2004, and in front of a sellout crowd at the Charlotte UltraSwim meet, he showed why, handing Michael Phelps a rare loss in a final.
snippet: The 100-meter backstroke has been Aaron Peirsol’s turf since 2004, and in front of a sellout crowd at the Charlotte UltraSwim meet, he showed why, handing Michael Phelps a rare loss in a final.
